name: Tongtong Coin
description: PURPOSE : TTC is a mainnet coin issued by Tomato Group in Korea. Currently, we have wallet service and messenger service based on TTC, and we are developing services such as broadcasting, media, and finance in Metaverse. FUNCTION : TTC is specialized in remittance and wallet functions by implementing very low fees and fast TPS through its own mainnet. TTC has a total issuance of 1 billion, and you can check this in the Tomato Chain browser, its own explorer.
